executive_summary: Acme Holdings Inc is seeking to expand their digital presence and increase lead generation through a comprehensive digital marketing strategy. This proposal outlines our recommended approach to achieve measurable growth in the next 6 months.

sections.title: What We Learned

content.label: Current State
content.text: Limited organic search presence beyond branded keywords. Website traffic is primarily direct, with minimal inbound lead generation.

content.label: Goals
content.text: Increase qualified leads by 150% and establish thought leadership in the financial services industry.

content.label: Challenges
content.text: Highly competitive keywords, long sales cycles, and need for compliance-friendly content.

sections.quote: We need a partner who understands both marketing and our industry constraints.

items.finding: Current website lacks topical authority and technical optimization
items.opportunity: Build content hub around financial planning topics, improve site speed, and implement structured data
Launch targeted Google Ads campaigns for high-intent keywords with conversion-optimized landing pages

items.finding: Blog exists but lacks consistency and strategic focus
items.opportunity: Develop editorial calendar with weekly posts targeting decision-makers in target segments

phases.activities: SEO audit, keyword research, competitor analysis, content strategy development, analytics setup
Technical SEO fixes, content creation (8-10 articles), paid search campaigns launch, conversion tracking
Ongoing content, campaign optimization, link building, monthly reporting and strategy refinement

sections.title: Investment

pricing_options.name: Essential
pricing_options.subtitle: Foundation + SEO Focus
pricing_options.description: SEO strategy, technical optimization, content creation (4 posts/month), monthly reporting

pricing_options.name: Growth
pricing_options.subtitle: Essential + Paid Acquisition
pricing_options.description: Everything in Essential, plus Google Ads management ($3K ad spend included), landing page optimization, weekly reporting

pricing_options.name: Enterprise
pricing_options.subtitle: Full-Service Growth
pricing_options.description: Everything in Growth, plus LinkedIn campaigns, marketing automation setup, dedicated account manager

sections.setup_fee: $4,500 one-time setup fee for initial audit, strategy, and platform configuration
